mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account AS "account", a.userid AS "userid", a.userhash AS "userhash", a.username AS "username", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tl_users a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_users( id, account, userid, userhash, username, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{account}, #{userid}, #{userhash}, #{username}, #{updateDate} )
